description: Jarred roasted red capsicum and a can of beans make this dip come together in minutes.
name: Red Capsicum & Cannellini Bean Dip With Cucumber Sticks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g roasted red capsicum, jarred, drain and reserve the oil
30g sundried tomatoes, drain and reserve the oil

recipeInstructions.text: Place the roasted red capsicums, cannellini beans, garlic, lemon and basil in a food processor and add 2 tablespoons of the reserved oil from the jar of capsicums or sundried tomatoes.
Blend to a smooth and silky dip, adding cold water if necessary.
Place the dip in a bowl and top with a swirl of pesto and cracked black pepper. Serve with cucumber sticks.
Scoop the dip into a bowl, season with cracked black pepper, scatter with chopped green olives and parsley and serve.
